query:
query LotByIdQuery {

          lots (id: 727506341339, first: 1) {
            
              pageInfo{
                hasNextPage
              },
              edges {
                cursor,
                node {
                  auctionDateDisplay,
                  artist,
                  artistDates,
                  artistFirstName,
                  artistLastName,              
                  auctionName,
                  auctionStart,
                  auctionStartISO,
                  artistRange{
                    start,
                    end
                  },
                  condition,
                  currency,
                  description,
                  estimateHigh,
                  estimateLow,
                  estimateOnRequest,
                  guaranteeLine,
                  guaranteeLineX,
                  houseLotURL,
                  id,
                  lotId,
                  largeImage,
                  lastUpdated,
                  location {
                    address,
                    city,
                    latitude,
                    longitude,
                    timezone
                  },
                  locationKey,
                  lotNumber,
                  lotPath,
                  lotSortNumber,
                  mediumImage,
                  relativeFlag,
                  relativeHeight,
                  relativeLength,
                  relativeWidth,
                  saleNumber,
                  salePrice,
                  sessions{
                    endISO,
                    endDateDisplay,
                    endLot,
                    lastUpdated,
                    sessionNumber,
                    start,
                    startDateDisplay,
                    saleNumber,
                    location {
                      address,
                      city,
                      latitude,
                      longitude,
                      timezone
                    },
                    startLot
                  },
                  smallImage,
                  sold,
                  sourceSessionId,
                  sothebysId,
                  startingBid,
                  objectRange{
                    start,
                    end
                  }
                }
              }
          }

      }
